title: sahasAratha vimathana
sahitya:
sahasAratha vimathana viracaya shubhamayi dinamanu sakala shubada shaurE


anupallavi

  mOhanIyatanu kAnti vinindita mAra shamala samanAdbhuta sucaritE


caraNam    nIlambOdhara sama parama dhrta sundara mrga pada sAlaka niTila 
nata sugama kAla damanAmara sEvita kanja jAta ghana garva vinAshana 
pAlita suragaNa bhOgi purAlaya padmanAbha vAsa mE hrdi pAvana
